summary: Adds a marriable Argonian follower to Riften Fishery. He uses both magic and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Knife-In-Dark is an Argonian follower you can marry. 

You can find him from Riften Fishery. He can do basic destruction magic, and stoneflesh. He has a bow and a sword too, and will use them occasionally.

I\'ll make a male khajiit follower as well, but it\'ll take a while. Perhaps I\'ll even make a character with some custom voice acting too, someday. :)
author: FantasyWolf
